summary: Scarlet Dawn Armor by jmenaru converted for Touched by Dibella body. HDT included.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kNN7lcT.png[/IMG]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50814/?]Scarlet Dawn Armor[/url] converted for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53135/?]Touched by Dibella body[/url].

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bL520bu.png[/IMG]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53135/?]Touched by Dibella body[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50814/?]Scarlet Dawn Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels System[/url](to boost the character height when wearing the boots)

For HDT version:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tOSaH9N.png[/IMG]

Install using NMM or any other mod manager of your choice.

1 - Install the TBD body
2 - Install the HDT HighHeels System
3 - Install the original Scarlet Dawn Armor
4 - Install this mod

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7W3r5Hk.png[/IMG]

It's compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53316/?]Touched by Dibella - Enhanced[/url], but I don't recommend to use the HDT version with it.

It's not compatible with any other body model and not compatible with any texture at the moment.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/g5pHpaG.png[/IMG]

Bethesda for the amazing game!
jmenaru / Bloodfree for the original armor
Arrow & Knee Mod Team for the HDT Physics Extensions[/center]
author: The Milkdrinker
